author: UltPanda
install_msg: Thank you for installing the One Piece Profile cog! Use `[p]help wanted` to see available commands. This cog integrates with Vert's LevelUp cog to create One Piece themed profiles and wanted posters.
name: OnePieceProfile
short: Generate One Piece themed profiles and wanted posters
description: Create One Piece themed profile cards with integration for LevelUp, display user level, custom staff ranks, sea role, pirate rank, and generate wanted posters.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not persistently store data or metadata about users.
